Question
========
  
A random sample of 1200 people filled out a questionnaire concerning the 
availability of trash cans on the streets in Amsterdam. Only 400 of the
participants were positive about this, whereas the others had a negative 
opinion. Calculate, based on this sample, the 95% confidence interval for the proportion of people that are positive about this new law.   

Answerlist
----------
* (0.306 , 0.360)
* (0.311 , 0.355)
* (0.640 , 0.693)
* (0.644 , 0.689)


Solution
========
  
Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
